title: Game finished and it gets clashed
body:
So my game finished normally.
Here is the problem.
I couldn't queue again, checked my history, recent game didnt get updated.
So I closed the game and opened it again.
It shows a "You have left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game"
So I tried to reconnect but then it clashed obviously as game doesnt exist.
And now Im stuck with this msg forever.
Any solution?

replies.body: let me know if u guys find anything... how to email riot?
yeh I made a post about same thing
